name: 2023 8th International Conference on Information Technology and Internet of Things
content: For papers submitted to ITIOT 2023 we offer the publications as following: Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and IJFCC editorial board, and accepted papers of ITIOT2023 will be published into in the International Journal of Future Computer and Communication as a special issue, which will be indexed by Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, INSPEC(IET), Google Scholar, EBSCO, etc.
